desc: List of notable users all over the StackExchange Network

Jon Skeet.title: The top user on Stack Overflow, who can rep cap every day without needing to visit

Eric Lippert.title: A user that answers a lot of C# questions on Stack Overflow

Doorknob.title: A pro-tem moderator on Programming Challenges & Code Golf.

SmokeDetector.title: A bot who watches incoming questions for possible spam

rolfl.title: One of CR's retired pro-tem mods, and one of CR's most active personalities

Jamal.title: One of CR's former pro-tem mods, and a current elected moderator

200_success.title: One of CR's former pro-tem mods, and a current elected moderator

SimonForsberg.title: One of CR's elected moderators, owner of Duga

Duga.title: A bot programmed by SimonAndrêForsberg. Duga posts SO/Programming.SE comments containing "code review", and in seperate chat rooms, repo changes

Captain Obvious.title: A feed that relays all the new questions posted on Code Review

RoboSanta.title: A bot that posts notable questions posted on Code Review

PinCrash.title: Room owner of The 2nd Monitor and The Nth Monitor

DanPantry.title: Room owner of The Nth Monitor

Quill.title: Room owner of The Nth Monitor and collaborator on Memer

Malachi.title: CodeReview revivalist specializing in C#, SQL Server, VB, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
